G

generateReport() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method generates the report: starting from a range of dates and times, it retrieves the data from the database and then it makes a file with the result of the query.
If the "from" date and time is disabled, then the query will retrieve all the tasks before the "to" date and time.
generateReport - Variable in class view.View
This is the button used to generate the report.
generateTextReport() - Method in class controller.ReportGenerator
This method aims to make a text file with a list of tasks that are included in a time range.
The time range is given by the constructor of this method.
In order to retrieve all the tasks from the desired time range, the method getTaskFromRange of the DAO is used, then, all the retrieved tasks will be putted in a file with the same location of the program and it will be called export.dat.
getClock() - Method in class view.View
This method returns the string with the value of the timer.
getClockLabel() - Method in class view.View
This method can be used to get the label of the timer.
getDailyTask() - Static method in class controller.persistence.database.management.TaskDao
This method retrieves all the task executed today.
getDatabaseConnection() - Static method in class controller.persistence.database.management.DatabaseManager
This method opens a connection and create a table if it does not exist.
getDelta() - Method in class model.Task
 
getEndTime() - Method in class model.Task
 
getFancyDate(LocalDate) - Static method in class model.TimeUtils
This method returns a string structured in this way: YYYY/MM/DD from a LocalDate.
getFancyDateTime(LocalDateTime) - Static method in class model.TimeUtils
This method returns a string structured in this way: YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm:ss from a LocalDateTime.
getFancyTime(LocalTime) - Static method in class model.TimeUtils
This method returns a string structured in this way: HH:mm:ss from a LocalTime.
getFromDate() - Method in class view.View
This is the method used to get the "from" date and time filter for the report.
getGenerateReport() - Method in class view.View
This is the method used to get the button that generates the report.
getHours() - Method in class controller.TimerManager
It returns the hours from a string formatted in this way: HH:mm:ss.
Just the substring method is called, together with the parseInt method in order to get the integer.
getInfoViewHandler() - Method in class view.View
This method is used to create a new message for the user.
getMinutes() - Method in class controller.TimerManager
It returns the minutes from a string formatted in this way: HH:mm:ss.
Just the substring method is called, together with the parseInt method in order to get the integer.
getNow() - Method in class view.View
This is the method used to retrieve the now label (the current date and time).
getSeconds() - Method in class controller.TimerManager
It returns the seconds from a string formatted in this way: HH:mm:ss.
Just the substring method is called, together with the parseInt method in order to get the integer.
getStartTime() - Method in class model.Task
 
getTaskDescription() - Method in class view.View
This method gets the task description.
getTaskFromRange(LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Static method in class controller.persistence.database.management.TaskDao
This method gets a list of tasks based on a range of LocalDateTime.
getTaskName() - Method in class model.Task
 
getToDate() - Method in class view.View
This is the method used to get the "to" date and time filter for the report.
